articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Japan's Nikkei crosses 51,000 on Tokyo-Washington trade optimism, Fed rate cut hopes - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific markets traded higher as investors await the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision later in in the day.
articles.content: Japan's Nikkei 225 jumped 2.17% to hit a record high, crossing above 51,000 for the first time Wednesday, lifted by renewed optimism over U.S.-Japan trade ties and expectations of another Federal Res… [+2579 chars]
